he Dragons Flame was the famed flagship of Westgates navy in the 14 century DR.
The vessel was considered to be one of the most expensive ships that had ever sailed across Dragonmere. The Dragons Flame was bedecked in gold and silver platings and its sides were decorated with intricate and lavish trimmings.
As of the , the Dragons Flame was renowned for being a moving piece of dazzling propaganda and advertisement for the economic power and wealth of the city of Westgate. A miniature copy of the ship was proudly displayed in the office of the Harbormaster in Westgates Harbor Loop. The office was open to the public and served as a miniature museum of various symbols of the past conflicts and displays of the present accomplishments.
